languages.text: В последующие часы пленник в полной мере познал, сколь изощренна и беспощадна может быть Кровавая паутина в поисках истины.
In the hours that followed, the captive became fully aware of how sophisticated and ruthless the Bloodspun Web can be in its quest for the truth.
languages.original_text: В последующие часы пленник в полной мере познал, сколь изощренна и беспощадна может быть Кровавая паутина в поисках истины.

traits.locale_text: In the hours that followed, the captive became fully aware of how sophisticated and ruthless the Bloodspun Web can be in its quest for the truth.

In the hours that followed, the captive became fully aware of how sophisticated and ruthless the Bloodspun Web can be in its quest for the truth.

languages.text: In den folgenden Stunden wurde dem Gefangenen bewusst, wie raffiniert und skrupellos das Blutgesponnene Netz auf seiner Suche nach der Wahrheit sein kann.
languages.original_text: In the hours that followed, the captive became fully aware of how sophisticated and ruthless the Bloodspun Web can be in its quest for the truth.

traits.locale_text: In den folgenden Stunden wurde dem Gefangenen bewusst, wie raffiniert und skrupellos das Blutgesponnene Netz auf seiner Suche nach der Wahrheit sein kann.

languages.text: Dans les heures qui ont suivi, la prisonnière a pris conscience de la sophistication et de l'implacabilité déployées par la Toile de Sang dans sa quête de vérité.
languages.original_text: In the hours that followed, the captive became fully aware of how sophisticated and ruthless the Bloodspun Web can be in its quest for the truth.

traits.locale_text: Dans les heures qui ont suivi, la prisonnière a pris conscience de la sophistication et de l'implacabilité déployées par la Toile de Sang dans sa quête de vérité.

languages.text: En las horas subsiguientes, el prisionero descubrió la sofisticación y la crueldad que la Red Sanguinolenta puede emplear para buscar la verdad.
languages.original_text: In the hours that followed, the captive became fully aware of how sophisticated and ruthless the Bloodspun Web can be in its quest for the truth.

traits.locale_text: En las horas subsiguientes, el prisionero descubrió la sofisticación y la crueldad que la Red Sanguinolenta puede emplear para buscar la verdad.

languages.text: それからの数時間のうちに、捕虜たちはブラッドスパン・ウェブが真実を追求する上でいかに洗練されており、冷酷であるのかを十分に理解した。
languages.original_text: In the hours that followed, the captive became fully aware of how sophisticated and ruthless the Bloodspun Web can be in its quest for the truth.

traits.locale_text: それからの数時間のうちに、捕虜たちはブラッドスパン・ウェブが真実を追求する上でいかに洗練されており、冷酷であるのかを十分に理解した。

languages.text: 在接下来的几个小时里，那个俘虏充分意识到织血罗网探寻真相的过程有多么繁复、多么残忍。
languages.original_text: In the hours that followed, the captive became fully aware of how sophisticated and ruthless the Bloodspun Web can be in its quest for the truth.

traits.locale_text: 在接下来的几个小时里，那个俘虏充分意识到织血罗网探寻真相的过程有多么繁复、多么残忍。

languages.text: İlerleyen saatlerde mahkûm, Kanipi Ağı'nın hakikat arayışında ne kadar sofistike ve acımasız olabileceğini tam anlamıyla görüyor.
languages.original_text: In the hours that followed, the captive became fully aware of how sophisticated and ruthless the Bloodspun Web can be in its quest for the truth.
